chapters.title: Chapter 17: An Arrival
chapters.info: Avene Sahera, p. 231—Woman on Moiraine's list of new mothers. She is from a “village on the high road between Chachin and Canluum,” according to what one of the Accepted wrote down; this village turned out to be Ravinda. She is plump, and has graying hair. See also Sahera, Migel.
